LanguageData.Infusion.Infuser.Label: {0} infuser
LanguageData.Infusion.Infuser.Description: A single-use canister containing mechanites programmed to enhance an equipment.
LanguageData.Infusion.Job.Message.ExtractionFailure: Extraction of {0} from {1} has failed. The infusion and infuser are both lost.
LanguageData.Infusion.Job.Message.ExtractionFailureIn: Extraction of {0} from {1} has failed. The infusion is destroyed.
Extraction of {0} from {1} has failed. The infuser is destroyed.
LanguageData.Infusion.EffectGizmo.Description: Enables special effects such as flames or explosions.
LanguageData.Infusion.ITab.Hint: Click an infusion to designate for an extraction/removal
LanguageData.Infusion.ITab.ApplyInfuser.Description: Only infusers usable on this equipment will be shown.
LanguageData.Infusion.ITab.MarkForExtraction: Click to mark this infusion for an extraction. (Success rate {0})
LanguageData.Infusion.ITab.MarkForRemoval:
Marked for an extraction. (Success rate {0}) Extraction costs an empty infuser. Failing it may result it loss of the infusion and the infuser.
One of your colonist with crafting job will extract it.
Click again to mark this infusion for a removal instead.
LanguageData.Infusion.ITab.Unmark:
Marked for a removal. Removing infusion costs nothing.
One of your colonist with crafting job will remove it.
Click again to cancel the removal.
